It's a pleasure to meet you, I'm a highly motivated Afghan-American Graduate from Sacramento State University. I have experience python scripting on existing and new code bases for NVME SSD drives on a industrial scale, as well as web development in C# and BOOTSTRAP.

Software Developer

I created new software to automate Non-volatile Memory Solid State Drive testing on Industrial scale silicon devices. I ensured all drives were accurately testing for Temperature and workload sustainability under heavy Inputs/Outputs sustained by daily usage from customers.

Interests

Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. In the winter, I am an avid skier and novice ice climber. During the warmer months here in Colorado, I enjoy mountain biking, free climbing, and kayaking.

When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.
